sentences: The Credentials Committee was appointed on Monday and comprised the following six members: Djé Kouakou Bernard (Côte d’Ivoire); Ali Shareef (Maldives); Liliam Ballon (Peru); Alessandro Nardi (US); Arona Ngari (Cook Islands); and Dovilė Vaitkutė (Lithuania).
The Credentials Committee convened until mid-day Tuesday to consider credentials submitted by members.
enb_long_title: 42nd Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-42)
